author: Nicholas C. Zakas
books.description: ECMAScript 6 represents the biggest update to the core of JavaScript in the history of the language. In Understanding ECMAScript 6, expert developer Nicholas C. Zakas provides a complete guide to the object types, syntax, and other exciting changes that ECMAScript 6 brings to JavaScript.
books.subtitle: The Definitive Guide for JavaScript Developers
books.title: Understanding ECMAScript 6
